content: this cowl is my treat to you this season perfect for beginners and quick to knit it s designed with holiday gifting in mind all you need is a single skein of aran-weight yarn with a soft lace pattern that s simple to memorize this cowl knits up fast and brings a cozy warm touch to any outfit whether you re making one for yourself or a loved one it s a feel-good project that s free for everyone this season ✨grab your yarn and join me in making something special ✨ #easyasaircowl #holidayknitgifts #freeknitpattern **difficulty ** beginner you will need to know how to cast on knit and purl stitch decrease and some easy lace stitches including yarnovers instructions provided **materials needed ** 1 skein 50g/ 1 75oz of aran-weight yarn size us 8/ 5 0mm 16 /40cm circular needles stitch markers including one unique row counter optional scissors tapestry needle blocking tools optional the instructions are written and charted **how do i download my pattern ** once payment is received you will receive an email containing a download link button for the pdf pattern make sure you have a pdf reader installed to open the pattern all patterns are written in standard us terms **stay in touch ** ravelry lungc instagram @corrinelungdesigns facebook corrine lung designs **share ** please share your work on social media with the hashtag **#easyasaircowl** and **#corrinelungdesigns** to share the handmade love this pattern is a © corrine lung 2024 of corrine lung designs easy as air cowls created using this pattern may be sold in small quantities less than 10 total with written consent first given by corrine lung of corrine lung designs credit must be given to corrine lung designs pattern and photos can not be used for resale purposes
